docs.lead_paragraph: Following accusations that the case was being ignored by the national news media, reporters descended Monday on Philadelphia, where Dr. Kermit Gosnell was on trial.

headline.seo: Online Furor Draws Press to Abortion Doctor’s Trial
headline.main: Online Furor Draws Press to Abortion Doctor’s Trial
headline.print_headline: Online Furor Draws Press to Abortion Doctor’s Trial

docs.abstract: Reporters swarm case against Philadelphia abortion provider Dr Kermit Gosnell after online furor that case was being ignored by national media because of troubling accounts of late-term abortions; Gosnell is charged with killing seven viable fetuses at his clinic.
docs.snippet: Following accusations that the case was being ignored by the national news media, reporters descended Monday on Philadelphia, where Dr. Kermit Gosnell was on trial.

docs.lead_paragraph: Interviews with pregnant women in Ghana, which has a high rate of stillbirths, suggest that those who slept on their sides had a lower risk of stillbirth.

headline.seo: Side Sleeping May Reduce Risk of Stillbirth
headline.main: Side Sleeping May Reduce Risk of Stillbirth
headline.print_headline: Side Sleeping May Reduce Risk of Stillbirth

docs.snippet: Interviews with pregnant women in Ghana, which has a high rate of stillbirths, suggest that those who slept on their sides had a lower risk of stillbirth.
